Name: The Door of Ice 冰封之门
About the game: The 'The Door of Ice' is an adventurous shooting class VR game, suitable for HTC's VR platform. The game is shooting and exploring with the first person point of view. The main crowd is over 16 years old and has HTC VR equipment players. The game is rich in content, changeable and diverse, and is committed to creating a virtual world full of passion.
Developers: 广州虚拟动力网络技术有限公司
Publishers: 广州虚拟动力网络技术有限公司
